attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Angela Lansbury has had a tremendous career both on stage and on the screen.  Nominated for a number of Oscars (starting with her debut in the early 1940's) and winner of a number of tv awards for her legendary role as Jessica Fletcher in 'Murder She Wrote', she has been able to sustain a career for many many years.  A true icon of Broadway (winning 4 Tonys for best actress in a  musical-a record, she has just been nominated for a Tony for Best Actress at the age of 81.  A phenomenal talent that deserves to be recognised!!!
